data.title: A Site Trademark + Rendezvous Lurk
data.description: Set up an aggressive A Site lurk with this placement of utility, allowing you to take an aggressive fight early. A teammate can play in a non-committed position towards A Belt and help you contest.

data.title: Mid Orange Trademark + Rendezvous Lurk
data.description: Lurk towards Mid with this combination of utility, allowing you to take an aggressive position on the map to influence the round.

data.title: B Long Trademark + Rendezvous Lurk
data.description: To first effectively use this setup, make sure you have information that Yellow is cleared of Defenders. Once you have done so, set up your Rendezvous to take aggressive angles.
